SEARCH
Package repository

Interface AbstractRepository<ID,E extends Entity<ID>>

Type Parameters:
ID - Type E must have an attribute of type ID.
E - Entity that is stored in the Repository.
All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryRepository
public interface AbstractRepository<ID,E extends Entity<ID>>
CRUD Operations for the repository interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    E
    delete(ID id)
    Removes an entity from the repository

    All the contents of the repository.

  • Method Details

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the repository is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the repository is empty, false otherwise.

    • size

      int size()
      Size of the repository.
      Returns:
      Number of entities E stored in the repository.

    • getAll

      Iterable<E> getAll()
      All the contents of the repository.
      Returns:
      All the values stored in the repository.

    • getOne

      E getOne(ID id) throws RepositoryException, IllegalArgumentException
      Searches for one entity in the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the Entity to search
      Returns:
      Entity with its ID equal to id
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - If the entity with the specified ID doesn't exist
      IllegalArgumentException - If the id is null.

    • save

      void save(E e) throws RepositoryException, IllegalArgumentException
      Adds an entity to the repository.
      Parameters:
      e - Entity that should be added
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - If the entity that should be added already exists.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the entity is null.

    • delete

      E delete(ID id) throws RepositoryException, IllegalArgumentException
      Removes an entity from the repository
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the entity to remove.
      Returns:
      Removed entity.
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - If the entity with the specified ID doesn't exist.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the id is null.

    • update

      E update(E e) throws RepositoryException, IllegalArgumentException
      Updates and entity.
      Parameters:
      e - New entity.
      Returns:
      The entity before updates.
      Throws:
      RepositoryException - If the entity with the specified ID doesn't exist.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the id is null.
